bluetoothDoesNotSupported() - Method in interface com.rigado.rigablue.IRigCoreBluetoothCommon
This callback method is executed if Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on the device or if the Android manifest is missing the appropriate bluetooth permissions.

This method is called when Bluetooth is unavailable on the current device or the application manifest is missing the appropriate Bluetooth permissions.
